content.text: Match ends, Colchester United 2, Charlton Athletic 1.
Second Half ends, Colchester United 2, Charlton Athletic 1.
Goal!  Colchester United 2, Charlton Athletic 1. Reza Ghoochannejhad (Charlton Athletic) header from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Ricardo Vaz Te.
Richard Brindley (Colchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Simon Makienok (Charlton Athletic).
